channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: Midjourney releases V7, its first new AI image model in nearly a year
item.description: Midjourney, one of the first AI-based image generators on the web, has released its first new AI image model in nearly a year. Dubbed V7, the model be...

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to supercharge pr...

item.title: StrictlyVC is heading to London this May
item.description: StrictlyVC is crossing the Atlantic! On 13 May, London will play host to an exclusive StrictlyVC evening, delivering the same high-caliber VC insider ...

item.title: Amazon’s new AI agent will shop third-party sites for you
item.description: Amazon is starting to test a new AI shopping agent, a feature it calls “Buy for Me,” with a subset users, the company announced in a blog post Thursda...

item.title: HMD OffGrid Satellite Communicator Review: Fits in Your Pocket
item.description: If you love the backcountry, this tiny, tough, and relatively affordable satellite communicator can give you peace of mind.

item.title: ReMarkable Tablets Just Got a Bunch of New Templates to Boost Your Productivity
item.description: If you own a reMarkable tablet, this update just made your digital notebook a whole lot more useful.

item.title: Torpedo Bats and the Physics of the Sweet Spot
item.description: Baseball season just started, and everyone’s talking about these crazy new bats. Will they change the game?

item.title: The 39 Best Movies on Hulu This Week (April 2025)
item.description: A Complete Unknown, Anora, and Jurassic Park are just a few of the movies you need to watch on Hulu right now.

item.title: The Trump Tariffs Are How Everything Works Now
item.description: The US is barreling toward a recession for no good reason, and dragging the world—and a few thousand penguins on remote Antarctic islands—down with it...
